content.name: table
content.label: Table
content.gloss: a piece of furniture having a smooth flat top that is usually supported by one or more vertical legs

content.name: regular_table
content.label: Regular table
content.gloss: Table without cabinets or drawers

content.name: desk
content.label: Desk
content.gloss: a piece of furniture with a writing surface and usually drawers or other compartments

content.name: game_table
content.label: Game table
content.gloss: Special table for pool, ping pong, cards, foosball, air hockey, or other games

content.name: picnic_table
content.label: Picnic table
content.gloss: Table with benches or chairs for picnics

content.name: bench
content.label: Bench
content.gloss: a long seat for more than one person

content.name: bench_connector
content.label: Bench Connector
content.gloss: a connecting part that connects the chair/bench to the table

content.name: pool_table
content.label: Pool table
content.gloss: Table for playing pool

content.name: ping_pong_table
content.label: Ping-pong table
content.gloss: Table for playing ping pong

content.name: card_table
content.label: Card table
content.gloss: Table for playing cards

content.name: foosball_table
content.label: Foosball table
content.gloss: Table for playing foosball

content.name: airhockey_table
content.label: Airhockey table
content.gloss: Table for playing airhockey

content.name: tabletop
content.label: Tabletop
content.gloss: the top horizontal work surface of a table

content.name: tabletop_surface
content.label: Tabletop surface
content.gloss: surface of a tabletop

content.name: tabletop_dropleaf
content.label: Tabletop dropleaf
content.gloss: a hinged section (leaf) of a tabletop that can be folded down (dropped)

content.name: tabletop_frame
content.label: Tabletop frame
content.gloss: frame of a tabletop

content.name: airhockey_striker
content.label: Airhockey striker
content.gloss: A striker (sometimes called a goalie, paddle or mallet ) is a hand held piece used to strike the airhockey puck.  It consists of a simple handle attached to a flat surface that will usually lie flush with the surface of the table.

content.name: airhockey_puck
content.label: Airhockey puck
content.gloss: Disc shaped piece that is to be pushed by the stricker into the goal

content.name: ping_pong_net
content.label: Ping-pong net
content.gloss: Net dividing the ping-pong table into two

content.name: ping_pong_paddle
content.label: Ping-pong paddle
content.gloss: Paddle for playing ping pong

content.name: pool_cue_stick
content.label: Pool cue stick
content.gloss: sports implement consisting of a tapering rod used to strike a cue ball in pool or billiards

content.name: pool_ball
content.label: Pool ball
content.gloss: Round ball for pool

content.name: pool_ball_rack
content.label: Pool ball rack
content.gloss: Rack for arranging pool balls, typically triangle shaped

content.name: foosball_rod
content.label: Foosball rod
content.gloss: Rod on which the little foosball players are placed

content.name: foosball_handle
content.label: Foosball handle
content.gloss: Handle for turning the foosball handle

content.name: foosball_player
content.label: Foosball player
content.gloss: Little foosball player that is fitted on the rod and turned

content.name: hutch
content.label: Hutch
content.gloss: set of shelves on top of the desk for storage

content.name: shelf
content.label: Shelf
content.gloss: a support that consists of a horizontal surface for holding objects

content.name: top_panel
content.label: Top panel
content.gloss: a board-like part that forms the top most panel of a shelving unit

content.name: bottom_panel
content.label: Bottom panel
content.gloss: a board-like part that forms the bottom most panel of a cabinet or table, often will touch the ground totally

content.name: back_panel
content.label: Back panel
content.gloss: Back panel of a shelf, table, or cabinet

content.name: vertical_divider_panel
content.label: Vertical divider panel
content.gloss: Vertical divider panel making one big shelf into smaller cubbies

content.name: vertical_side_panel
content.label: Vertical side panel
content.gloss: main vertical support side panel

content.name: vertical_front_panel
content.label: Vertical Front Panel
content.gloss: main vertical support front panel

content.name: base_side_panel
content.label: Base side panel
content.gloss: Side panel for a base

content.name: bar
content.label: Bar
content.gloss: A bar-like shape

content.name: board
content.label: Board
content.gloss: A board-like shape

content.name: circle
content.label: Circle
content.gloss: A circle-like shape

content.name: glass
content.label: Glass
content.gloss: A board of glass

content.name: cabinet_door
content.label: Cabinet door
content.gloss: Door for a cabinet

content.name: cabinet_door_surface
content.label: Cabinet door surface
content.gloss: Surface forming the cabinet door

content.name: hinge
content.label: Hinge
content.gloss: a joint that holds two parts together so that one can swing relative to the other

content.name: handle
content.label: Handle
content.gloss: the appendage to an object that is designed to be held in order to use or move it

content.name: object
content.label: Object
content.gloss: Various objects found on shelves

content.name: book
content.label: Book
content.gloss: a written or printed work consisting of pages glued or sewn together along one side and bound in covers.

content.name: television
content.label: Television
content.gloss: a device that receives television signals and reproduces them on a screen.

content.name: clothes
content.label: Clothes
content.gloss: items worn to cover the body.

content.name: shoes
content.label: Shoes
content.gloss: a covering for the foot, typically made of leather, with a sturdy sole and not reaching above the ankle.

content.name: vase
content.label: Vase
content.gloss: a decorative container, typically made of glass or china and used as an ornament or for displaying cut flowers.

content.name: picture_frame
content.label: Picture frame
content.gloss: A framed picture or photo

content.name: drawer
content.label: Drawer
content.gloss: a boxlike container in a piece of furniture; made so as to slide in and out

content.name: drawer_box
content.label: Drawer box
content.gloss: The box part of a drawer (most of the time, only the drawer front will be present for annotation)

content.name: drawer_front
content.label: Drawer front
content.gloss: Front of the drawer

content.name: drawer_side
content.label: Drawer side
content.gloss: Side of the drawer

content.name: drawer_bottom
content.label: Drawer bottom
content.gloss: Bottom of the drawer

content.name: drawer_back
content.label: Drawer back
content.gloss: Back of the drawer

content.name: drawer_rails
content.label: Drawer rails
content.gloss: Rails on which the drawer goes

content.name: drawer_slider
content.label: Drawer slider
content.gloss: Sliders on the drawer which attach to the rails

content.name: keyboard_tray
content.label: Keyboard tray
content.gloss: Tray for holding the keyboard

content.name: keyboard_tray_surface
content.label: Keyboard tray surface
content.gloss: Main surface of the keyboard tray

content.name: keyboard_tray_rails
content.label: Keyboard tray rails
content.gloss: Rails on which the keyboard bray goes

content.name: keyboard_tray_slider
content.label: Keyboard tray slider
content.gloss: Sliders on the keyboard tray which attach to the rails

content.name: table_base
content.label: Table Base
content.gloss: a support or foundation for table. It includes but is not limited to leg base, swivel base, pedestal base, foot base, etc.

content.name: regular_leg_base
content.label: Regular Leg Base
content.gloss: a table base that is composed of several vertical leg-like supporting sub-parts and no drawers, cabinets, or shelves. There can be several connections between legs, and contacts the ground by the legs, some horizontal bars or the foot/caster structure on the legs

content.name: shelving_base
content.label: Shelving Base
content.gloss: a table base that has shelves or a bottom panel that contacts the ground with some big area.

content.name: drawer_base
content.label: Drawer Base
content.gloss: a table base that is composed of drawers and cabinets

content.name: irregular_base
content.label: Irregular Base
content.gloss: a table base that is irregular shaped, possibly with strange looking supports

content.name: bar_stretcher
content.label: Bar Stretcher
content.gloss: a supporting part joining the legs that is of bar/strip like shape

content.name: circular_stretcher
content.label: Circular Stretcher
content.gloss: a supporting part joining the legs that is of circular shape

content.name: runner
content.label: Runner
content.gloss: horizontal part that connects the end of legs and contacts the ground

content.name: tabletop_connector
content.label: Tabletop Connector
content.gloss: a part that connects the table base to the tabletop

content.name: star_leg_base
content.label: Star-shape Leg Base
content.gloss: a table base that includes a star-shape leg structure. Each leg of the star leg structure is near-horizontal to the ground plane.

content.name: central_support
content.label: Central Support
content.gloss: a central supporting part that connects the tabletop and the table legs/pedestal bases.  Please annotate each central supports individually if there are many.

content.name: mechanical_control
content.label: Mechanical Control
content.gloss: a complex mechanical control part that is often used to lift the table central cylinder. Just label one holistic part for each control unit. There is no need to label the mechanical details. Please use the option other to label the part we do not include in the list.

content.name: knob
content.label: Knob
content.gloss: a round handle

content.name: button
content.label: Button
content.gloss: an electrical switch operated by pressing

content.name: mounting_plate
content.label: Mounting Plane
content.gloss: a sheet of metal or wood or glass or plastic

content.name: lever
content.label: Lever
content.gloss: a rigid bar pivoted about a fulcrum

content.name: pedestal_base
content.label: Pedestal Base
content.gloss: a table base that includes a big pedestal part that contacts with the ground

content.name: pedestal
content.label: Pedestal
content.gloss: a big chunk of geometry that contacts the ground to stablize the table

content.name: short_leg
content.label: Short Leg
content.gloss: a very short leg that connects the table seat and the table foot/wheels

content.name: star_leg_set
content.label: Star-shape Leg Set
content.gloss: a star shape structure that contains many legs and the correlated foots or casters

content.name: leg
content.label: Leg
content.gloss: one of the supports for a piece of furniture

content.name: foot
content.label: Foot
content.gloss: a support resembling a pedal extremity

content.name: caster
content.label: Wheel Assembly
content.gloss: a pivoting roller attached to the bottom of furniture or trucks or portable machines to make them movable

content.name: brake
content.label: Brake
content.gloss: a restraint used to slow or stop a vehicle

content.name: caster_yoke
content.label: Caster Yoke
content.gloss: forked part for connecting wheel to mounting plate

content.name: caster_stem
content.label: Caster Stem
content.gloss: post part of caster rig

content.name: caster_mounting_plate
content.label: Mounting Plate
content.gloss: a sheet of metal or wood or glass or plastic

content.name: wheel
content.label: Wheel
content.gloss: a simple machine consisting of a circular frame with spokes (or a solid disc) that can rotate on a shaft or axle (as in vehicles or other machines)
